text: When using HubSpot Payment links in a custom module (using the built-in payment field type), is there a method of being able to test a payment??
isnt there a default  dummy card that can be used for testing?  Something like:<https://docs.stripe.com/testing>

Yes there are as found here:
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/payment-links/test-payment-links>

This outlines a testing process of generating a test link which would be for testing the account itself I suppose. But I'm trying to find an option for putting the account or a payment link into test mode and test the whole process of payment from a module.

The test card numbers from this guide do NOT work unless you're using a test payment link on its own... not within a module, page, etc.
